name: botbuilder-lsp-lg
description: Lg extension of botbulider using lsp
author: Microsoft Corporation

LG.Expression.ignoreUnknownFunction.description: Configure Diagnostics: Show diagnostic severity level of unknow functions in a LG file

LG.Expression.customFunctionList.description: Customized function list, should be separated by comma, eg. a, b, c

languageServerExample.maxNumberOfProblem.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

languageServerExample.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly && editorLangId == lg && !suggestWidgetVisible && vim.mode != 'Normal' && vim.mode != 'Visual' && vim.mode != 'VisualBlock' && vim.mode != 'VisualLine' && vim.mode != 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.mode != 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.mode != 'Replace' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionMode' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionInputMode' && vim.mode != 'SurroundInputMode'

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
